CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In order to corroborate the effect of the heteroatom substitution on charge transporting properties of the polymers , top - contact organic field - effect transistors ( OFETs ) were fabricated using solution processed PCDTBT and PCDSeBT , respectively , as the semiconducting layer on the octadecyltrichlorosilane ( OTS ) self - assembled monolayer (SAM)-modified Si / SiO 2 substrates ( see the detailed devices fabrication in the Experimental Section ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| top-contact organic field-effect transistors (OFETs) |
| solution processed PCDTBT |
| solution processed PCDSeBT |
| octadecyltrichlorosilane (OTS) |
| self-assembled monolayer (SAM) |
| Si / SiO2 substrates |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| solution processed PCDTBT |
| solution processed PCDSeBT |
| octadecyltrichlorosilane (OTS) |
| self-assembled monolayer (SAM) |

Note: "top-contact organic field-effect transistors (OFETs)", "Si / SiO2 substrates" were not considered as material names in this context as they are describing the type of device and the substrate material respectively.

Paragraph: In order to corroborate the effect of the heteroatom substitution on charge transporting properties of the polymers , top - contact organic field - effect transistors ( OFETs ) were fabricated using solution processed PCDTBT and PCDSeBT , respectively , as the semiconducting layer on the octadecyltrichlorosilane ( OTS ) self - assembled monolayer (SAM)-modified Si / SiO 2 substrates ( see the detailed devices fabrication in the Experimental Section ).

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In order to corroborate the effect of the heteroatom substitution on charge transporting properties of the polymers , top - contact organic field - effect transistors ( OFETs ) were fabricated using solution processed PCDTBT and PCDSeBT , respectively , as the semiconducting layer on the octadecyltrichlorosilane ( OTS ) self - assembled monolayer (SAM)-modified Si / SiO 2 substrates ( see the detailed devices fabrication in the Experimental Section ).

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| charge transporting properties of the polymers |
| top-contact organic field-effect transistors (OFETs) |
| solution processed PCDTBT and PCDSeBT |
| semiconducting layer |
| Si / SiO2 substrates |
| octadecyltrichlorosilane (OTS) self-assembled monolayer (SAM) |
| Si / SiO2 substrates (modified with OTS SAM) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| charge transporting properties of the polymers |
| top-contact organic field-effect transistors (OFETs) |
| solution processed PCDTBT and PCDSeBT |
| semiconducting layer made of PCDTBT and PCDSeBT |
| Si / SiO2 substrates |
| octadecyltrichlorosilane (OTS) self-assembled monolayer (SAM) |
| Si / SiO2 substrates (modified with OTS SAM) |

Explanation:

* "In order to corroborate the effect of the heteroatom substitution on charge transporting properties" - The phrase "charge transporting properties" refers to a material property, so it is a valid entity.
* "top-contact organic field-effect transistors (OFETs)" - OFETs are a type of transistor, but the property value here is the fact that they are top-contact, which is a material property.
* "were fabricated using solution processed PCDTBT and PCDSeBT, respectively, as the semiconducting layer" - The semiconducting layer is a material property of the transistors.
* "on the octadecyltrichlorosilane (OTS) self-assembled monolayer (SAM)-modified Si / SiO2 substrates" - The property value here is the fact that the substrates are modified with an OTS SAM, which is a material property.
